name: GetPVarNameAtIndex
description: Retrieve the name of a player's pVar via the index.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player variable to get the name of.

params_body.name: index
params_body.description: The index of the player's pVar.

params_body.name: ret_varname[]
params_body.description: A string to store the pVar's name in, passed by reference.

params_body.name: ret_len
params_body.description: The max length of the returned string, use sizeof().

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
GetPVarType: Get the type of the player variable.
 GetPVarInt: Get the previously set integer from a player variable.
 GetPVarFloat: Get the previously set float from a player variable.
 GetPVarString: Get the previously set string from a player variable.
